body.p: will you See the Goviner Mcgoffin & Committee for arming the State & See if I can git a contract to furnish a Quantity of Saltpeter a Quantity of Powder I have plans of find Locating for a Powder Mill Plenty of Water Power and Plenty of Caves to work 300 hands and could in Short Time be Mooving the business a hed Someone must have this contract & there is no one that I Know have the Same facility I have -- a Trusty Experianced Man in the Mill is all I Should be Lacking to go right on with the Business I am writing to old friend Swagart on the Same Subject See what you can do for Me
